ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Order of the cognitive tasks
Block code
Description of the trial
Task version
Order of the versions of the Bandit
Date on which the participants played the task
Time at which the participant started the task
Trial number
Game number
Indicates if the current game will be repeated
Notes: If the participant does not decide within 20 seconds, the computer asks �are you still there?�. If the participants responds to this by pressing a button, the round is restarted.

ElementDescription: Key pressed by participant in this trial
Notes: 1=Arm 1; 2=Arm 2; 3=Arm 3; space or enter or other keys may be pressed during check, so that the participant can indicate that they are still there

ElementDescription: Whether a reward was received on the current trial
Time since start of game until participant can start deciding for this trial
Time since start of game until participant pressed a button on this trial
Reaction Time
Reward rate of arm 1
Notes: Percentage of time it will provide a reward

ElementDescription: Reward rate of arm 2
Notes: Percentage of time it will provide a reward

ElementDescription: Reward rate of arm 3
Notes: Percentage of time it will provide a reward

ElementDescription: Feedback presented to participant at end of trial (in original language)
Total points earned by participant within this version of the Bandit
Total points earned by participant across both versions of the Bandit
Description of virtual player 1 (social Bandit only)
Description of virtual player 2 (social Bandit only)
Description of virtual player 3 (social Bandit only)
Chance of reward for slot 2
Notes: 0= No chance; 100 = Reward guaranteed if chosen

ElementDescription: Chance of reward for slot 3
Notes: 0= No chance; 100 = Reward guaranteed if chosen

ElementDescription: Cumulative rewards up to that trial
The position of the selection
The time the task was started on a 24 clock
Assigned group ID number
Session number
Time the trial started on a 24 hour clock
Time the choice was made on a 24 hour clock
Which slot was chosen
Chance of reward for slot 1
Notes: 0= No chance; 100 = Reward guaranteed if chosen
